overview:
With over 25 years of management experience with global healthcare companies, Jim Ham is ideally suited to lead SynergEyesÂ®, Inc.’s world-wide product launch activities. Most recently he was CEO and President of Kinetikos Medical, Inc. (KMI), which was acquired by Integra Life Sciences (IART). Jim led Kinetikos Medical from start up to a successful liquidity event: the company had 12 products in the market and more in the product development pipeline at the time of the sale.

Prior to Kinetikos Medical, Jim spent nine years at Allergan (AGN) in various senior management roles within the sales and marketing departments. His experience working with new technologies in emerging markets will be an integral part of SynergEyes’Â® international growth in coming years.
